content.body: I don't see an entry in the WHATNOT meeting notes for today, the meeting is happening right?

Deferred scripts inserted with createContextualFragment() are considered "not parser inserted"
https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/dynamic-markup-insertion.html#dom-range-createcontextualfragment 8.2
So `createContextualFragment` basically ignores the `defer` attribute
content.formatted_body:
Deferred scripts inserted with createContextualFragment() are considered "not parser inserted"

So createContextualFragment basically ignores the defer attribute
